title: Facebook Ads Specialist (Remote, Full-Time)
job_overview:
We’re Hiring: Facebook Ads Specialist (Remote, Full-Time)

Are you passionate about running high-converting Facebook Ads? We’re looking for a Facebook Ads Specialist to join our growing team! This is a fully remote and full-time role perfect for someone who enjoys creating impactful campaigns and driving real results.

What You'll Do:
Plan, launch, and manage Facebook Ad campaigns that drive traffic, leads, and conversions
Conduct audience research and competitor analysis to optimize targeting
Create engaging ad copy and creatives tailored to campaign goals
Monitor campaign performance and make data-driven improvements
Stay updated on Facebook Ads trends and algorithm updates
Work closely with our marketing and design teams
Provide clear reports and insights on campaign performance

What We're Looking For:
Proven experience managing multiple Facebook Ad accounts
Strong knowledge of Facebook Ads Manager and ad targeting strategies
Analytical mindset with attention to campaign data and metrics
Great communication and teamwork skills
Creative eye for developing effective ads

Nice to Have (But Not Required):
Experience with Google Ads or other paid media platforms 
Facebook Blueprint and/or Google Ads certifications

Perks & Benefits:
Paid Time Off
Overtime and Holiday Pay
Fixed Weekends Off
Employee Loan Program
Career development opportunities

How to Apply:
1. Complete the assessment: [Insert assessment link here]
2. Send an email to Upgrade to see actual info with the subject line: Facebook Ads Specialist - ["Your Full Name"]

A $3 token will be given to applicants who complete the test project and successfully pass all interview stages.
